item.title: Christy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I don't want no better book than what your face is." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Christy add a quote by Michael Winter
item.description: "There is nothing worse than a proud stoic. -- The Big Why" -- Michael Winter

item.title: Christy add a quote by Sherwood Anderson
item.description: "Only the few know the sweetness of the twisted apples." -- Sherwood Anderson

item.title: Christy add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "Every scar in my face is worth it." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Christy add a quote by Jim Harrison
item.description: "Every day I wonder how many things I am dead wrong about. -- True North" -- Jim Harrison

item.title: Christy add a quote by Robertson Davies
item.description: "I wish people weren't so set on being themselves, when that means being a bastard." -- Robertson Davies

item.title: Christy add a quote by James Crumley
item.description: "Lady bartenders live a tougher life than anybody knows. -- Dancing Bear" -- James Crumley

item.title: Christy add a quote by Harry Crews
item.description: "That was the only decision there was once upon a time: what to do with the night." -- Harry Crews

item.title: Christy add a quote by Jim Harrison
item.description: "If you live on the railroad tracks the train's going to hit you, Grandpa used to say. -- Brown Dog" -- Jim Harrison

item.title: Christy add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "This country will kill you in a heartbeat and still people love it." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Christy add a quote by Thomas McGuane
item.description: "I considered the wonder of the things that befell me, convinced that my life was the best omelet you could make with a chainsaw. -- Panama" -- Thomas McGuane

item.title: Christy add a quote by Charles Portis
item.description: "Listen, here's what I'd like to do: I'd like to live in a trailer and play records all night." -- Charles Portis

item.title: Christy add a quote by Lorrie Moore
item.description: "She hadn't been given the proper tools to make a real life with, she decided, that was it. She'd been given a can of gravy and a hairbrush and told, "There you go." -- Willing" -- Lorrie Moore

item.title: Christy add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Most men are a little better than their circumstances give them a chance to be." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Christy add a quote by Jane Smiley
item.description: "Like most of the educated, I do harbor a fondness for the sins of my ignorant past." -- Jane Smiley

item.title: Christy add a quote by Richard Russo
item.description: "I'll tell you one thing, though. It's a terrible thing to be a disappointment to a good woman." -- Richard Russo

item.title: Christy add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.
item.description: "I say in speeches that a plausible mission of artists is to make people appreciate being alive at least a little bit. I am then asked if I know of any artists who pulled that off. I reply, 'The Beatles did'." -- Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

item.title: Christy add a quote by May Sarton
item.description: "The more articulate one is, the more dangerous words become." -- May Sarton

item.title: Christy add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Anything that just costs money is cheap." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Christy add a quote by Tom Andrews
item.description: "Sometimes you look for the world, and it's there." -- Tom Andrews

item.title: Christy add a quote by Walker Percy
item.description: "I like to eat crawfish and drink beer. That's despair?" -- Walker Percy

item.title: Christy add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Reserving judgements is a matter of infinite hope." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Christy add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "It's easier to bleed than sweat, Mr. Motes." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Christy add a quote by Larry McMurtry
item.description: "Maybe you can make art out of unredeemed pain, but only if you're a genius -- Dostoyevsky perhaps." -- Larry McMurtry

item.title: Christy add a quote by Brian Morton
item.description: "Even in your smallest gestures, you express your sense of honor, if you have one." -- Brian Morton

item.title: Christy add a quote by Peter Handke
item.description: "No one can be trusted who isn't thrilled with himself at least now and then." -- Peter Handke

item.title: Christy add a quote by Joy Williams
item.description: "Nothing we do is inevitable, but everything we do is irreversible." -- Joy Williams

item.title: Christy add a quote by Tony Earley
item.description: "Writers do not write about a place because they belong there, but because they want to." -- Tony Earley

item.title: Christy add a quote by Alistair MacLeod
item.description: "All of us are better when we're loved." -- Alistair MacLeod

item.title: Christy add a quote by Thomas McGuane
item.description: "I may be the wrong person for my life." -- Thomas McGuane
